I'm Nathaniel D. Phillips, PhD. I'm known for [ Healthcare Data Science](https://posit.co/resources/videos/flatironkitchen-how-we-overhauled-a-frankensteinian-sql-workflow-with-the-tidyverse), [R Piratery](www.bookdown.org/ndphillips/yarrr), and [Decision Making Research](https://github.com/ndphillips/FFTrees).

Check out my [About](about.qmd), [Resources](resources.qmd), and [Contact](contact.qmd) pages to learn more about me and my work.

## Am I Open To Work?

:::{.callout-tip title="Q4 2024: Yes!"}

I am available for new opportunities to improve lives through data science at a value and purpose driven organization. Reach out to me at nathaniel.d.phillips.is@gmail.com to discuss!

:::
